edu.concordia.app.components

Class LakeTiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.concordia.app.components.LakeTiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LakeTiles
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is to create the lake tile object, the lake tile have four colors and some of the lake tiles have a platform marker,again lake tile can have adjacent top/bottom/left/right lake tile
    Author:
    Team E
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
